snippet: The first criminal prosecution of Planned Parenthood ended with prosecutors dropping all charges against a local affiliate.
abstract: First criminal prosecution of Planned Parenthood comes to an abrupt end when Kansas prosecutors drop all charges against a local affiliate accused of failing to determine the viability of fetuses before abortions were performed.
lead_paragraph: The first criminal prosecution of Planned Parenthood ended with prosecutors dropping all charges against a local affiliate.

headline.seo: All Charges Dropped Against Planned Parenthood in Kansas Abortion Case
headline.main: Abortion Cases Against Clinic in Kansas Are Dropped by Prosecutors
headline.print_headline: Abortion Cases Against Clinic Are Dropped By Prosecutors
